description:
As a user
    I want to be able to validate the API endpoints
    So that I can confirm the API is working correctly
name: MediaWiki - Validation

elements.name: Verify that the login API cannot be logged in with invalid data - <scenario>

steps.name: I send GET request to 'action=query&type=login&format=json&meta=tokens' generates a token
the user login as a test user with username '' and password 'cteivp02ftopvos8h9n1vpn353g6o29q'
I get failed login response 'Incorrect username or password entered. Please try again.'

result.error_message:
AssertionError
    + expected - actual

    -'The supplied credentials could not be authenticated.'
    +'Incorrect username or password entered. Please try again.'

    at Context.eval (https://en.wikipedia.org/__cypress/tests?p=cypress/integration/media-wiki/media-wiki-validation.feature:99:12)

elements.name: Verify that the login API cannot be logged in with invalid data - <scenario>

steps.name: I send GET request to 'action=query&type=login&format=json&meta=tokens' generates a token
the user login as a test user with username 'Invalid' and password 'cteivp02ftopvos8h9n1vpn353g6o29q'
I get failed login response 'Incorrect username or password entered. Please try again.'
